Return companies owned by the current user

name = None¶
organizations(request, pk=None)[source]¶

Get all organizations for a specific company (by company ID) for admins. Its purpose is not for user functionalities but rather for admin settings, use base organization endpoints for fetching users’ organizations.

perform_create(serializer)[source]¶

Set the owner of the company to the current user
